channel.title: The Root of all Evil
channel.description: Meet Mr. Leonard Towers in his vast estate, Now meet Jeeves, his faithful house servant who is doing everything he can to steal Mr. Towers' fortune - at any cost.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Follow the daily adventures of the very wealthy Mr. Leonard Towers and his schemeing serveant, Jeeves
channel.itunes:summary: Meet Mr. Leonard Towers in his vast Estate, Now meet Jeeves, his faithful house servant who is doing everything he can to steal Mr. Towers' fortune - at any cost.
channel.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

image.title: The Root of all Evil
image.description: Meet Mr. Leonard Towers and his eager-to-steal house servant, Jeeves

item.title: Episode 01 - The Nemesis
item.description: Meet Mr. Leonard Towers and his faithful house servant, Jeeves. Towers suspects that his vast fortune might be disappearing and Jeeves hopes not to have Towers find out that he is the thief.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet Mr. Leonard Towers and Jeeves
item.itunes:summary: Meet Mr. Leonard Towers and his faithful house servant, Jeeves. Towers suspects that his vast fortune might be disappearing and Jeeves hopes not to have Towers find out that he is the thief.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 02 - Letter To The Nephew
item.description: Mr. Towers instructs Jeeves to write to his nephew to find out why and where his money is disappearing.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Jeeves is forced to write to Towers' nephew
item.itunes:summary: Mr. Towers instructs Jeeves to write to his nephew to find out why and where his money is disappearing.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 03 - An Evil Plan
item.description: Jeeves hatches an evil plan to eliminate Towers before the letter to the nephew can be mailed.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The letter must not reach the nephew
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves hatches an evil plan to eliminate Towers before the letter to the nephew can be mailed.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 04 - Mail That Letter
item.description: Jeeves goes into great detail in pointing out to Towers all the physical dangers of mailing the letter himself in the hopes that Towers will not mail it.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Mailing a letter can be downright dangerous.
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves goes into great detail in pointing out to Towers all the physical dangers of mailing the letter himself in the hopes that Towers will not mail it.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 05 - Unhappy Trails To You
item.description: Mr. Towers' insistence on delivering the letter to his nephew forces Jeeves to lay a trap in the trail to the nephew's house to stop the delivery.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Towers goes to deliver his letter to his nephew.
item.itunes:summary: Mr. Towers' insistence on delivering the letter to his nephew forces Jeeves to lay a trap in the trail to the nephew's house to stop the delivery.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 06 - A True Ding Dong
item.description: Mr. Towers' insistence on delivering the letter to his nephew forces Jeeves to lay a trap in the trail to the nephew's house to stop the delivery.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Jeeves reaches the nephew's house and lays in wait for Towers.
item.itunes:summary: Being the first to arrive at Mr. Towers nephew's house, Jeeves anxiously awaits Towers' arrival. Unfortunately, what is waiting for Jeeves is even more disturbing than his annoying employer.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 07 - The Ghost
item.description: Jeeves and the ghost in the nephew's house discuss Leonard Towers.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Ghost.
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves and the ghost in the nephew's house discuss Leonard Towers.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 08 - A Bag of Towers to go
item.description: Jeeves and the ghost of the nephew's house prepare to take care of Towers once and for all.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Jeeves and the ghost combine forces.
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves and the ghost of the nephew's house prepare to take care of Towers once and for all.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 09 - Have your tickets ready.
item.description: Back at Ivory Towers Estate, Mr. Towers reveals his plan to take a trip in order to locate his nephew.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Have your tickets ready.
item.itunes:summary: Back at Towers' estate, Mr. Towers reveals his plan to take a trip in order to locate his nephew
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 10 - Packing
item.description: Jeeves and Towers pack for their upcoming train trip.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 10 - Packing
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves and Towers pack for their upcoming train trip.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 11 - Train Ride of Terror
item.description: Jeeves, who does not travel well by rail, is sicker than a dog.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 11- Train Ride of Terror
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves, who does not travel well by rail, is sicker than a dog.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 12 - The Dream
item.description: At the railroad station, Jeeves dreams about what might have happened to Towers on their previous train trip.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 12 - The Dream
item.itunes:summary: At the railroad station, Jeeves dreams about what might have happened to Towers on their previous train trip.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 13 - Cab Ride
item.description: Towers hails a cab and instructs the driver to take himself and Jeeves to Towers' nephew.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 13 - Cab Ride
item.itunes:summary: Towers hails a cab and instructs the driver to take himself and Jeeves to Towers' nephew.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 14 - Deserted in the Desert
item.description: Jeeves suddenly finds himself alone in the vast desert.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 14 - Deserted in the Desert
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves suddenly finds himself alone in the vast desert
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 15 - Wandering
item.description: Jeeves suddenly finds himself alone in the vast desert.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 15 - Wandering
item.itunes:summary: Wandering aimlessly in the desert, Jeeves stumbles across some long lost treasure.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 16 - The Discovery
item.description: The toilet that Jeeves has found in the desert contains a promising surprise.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 16 - The Discovery
item.itunes:summary: The toilet that Jeeves has found in the desert contains a promising surprise.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 17 - The First Wish
item.description: Jeeves gets his first wish from the Genie of the toilet bowl
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 17 - The First Wish
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves gets his first wish from the Genie of the toilet bowl
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 18 - Gold Mine
item.description: For his second wish, Jeeves instructs the Genie of the toilet bowl to grant him gold.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 18 - Gold Mine
item.itunes:summary: For his second wish, Jeeves instructs the Genie of the toilet bowl to grant him gold.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 19 - An annoying mirage
item.description: Having given up on getting any wealth from the Genie, Towers again wanders the desert while confronting an extremely annoying mirage.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 19 - An annoying mirage
item.itunes:summary: Having given up on getting any wealth from the Genie, Towers again wanders the desert while confronting an extremely annoying mirage.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 20 - Close Encounter
item.description: Relenting on what could possibly go wrong with him in the desert, Jeeves suddenly encounters a spaceship.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 20 - Close Encounter
item.itunes:summary: Relenting on what could possibly go wrong with him in the desert, Jeeves suddenly encounters a spaceship.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 21 - Displeasing
item.description: Jeeves meets one of the aliens aboard the UFO, and is told of the probes.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 21 - Displeasing
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves meets one of the aliens aboard the UFO, and is told of the probes.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 22 - Reunion
item.description: Jeeves and Towers are reunited aboard the spaceship.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 22 - Reunion
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves and Towers are reunited aboard the spaceship.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 23 - The Probes
item.description: After their encounter with the probes, Jeeves introduces Towers to the alien.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 23 - The Probes
item.itunes:summary: After their encounter with the probes, Jeeves introduces Towers to the alien.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 24 - The Thing
item.description: The alien prepares Jeeves and Towers for The Thing.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 24 - The Thing
item.itunes:summary: The alien prepares Jeeves and Towers for The Thing.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 25 - The Outcome
item.description: Having had the experiment, The Thing, performed on them, Jeeves and Towers make a startling discovery.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 24 - The Outcome
item.itunes:summary: Having had the experiment, The Thing, performed on them, Jeeves and Towers make a startling discovery.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 26 - Elephant Joke
item.description: Back on earth again, Towers and Jeeves find themselves in a sweltering jungle and Towers tries his hand at an elephant joke.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Elephant Joke.
item.itunes:summary: Back on earth again, Towers and Jeeves find themselves in a sweltering jungle and Towers tries his hand at an elephant joke.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 27 - Jungle Drums
item.description: The two are confronted with distant jungle drums in the jungle.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Jungle Drums
item.itunes:summary: The two are confronted with distant jungle drums in the jungle.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 28 - Say what?
item.description: Jeeves tries to convince Towers of the impending danger by the jungle drums, but Towers seems to have hearing trouble.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Say what?
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves tries to convince Towers of the impending danger by the jungle drums, but Towers seems to have hearing trouble.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 29 - Friendly natives
item.description: Towers and Jeeves confront the Chief of the headhunter tribe, although Jeeves has a bit of a problem understanding the strange dialect.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The jungle has its hazards.
item.itunes:summary: Towers and Jeeves confront the Chief of the headhunter tribe, although Jeeves has a bit of a problem understanding the strange dialect.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 30 - Boiled ham
item.description: Jeeves and Towers find themselves about to be cooked alive in a giant caldron.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Cooking can be so unrewarding.
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves and Towers find themselves about to be cooked alive in a giant caldron.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 31 - Saved by the Bug
item.description: Jeeves is saved from becoming dinner for the headhunters by an unlikely, and unwanted, source.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Saved by the Bug.
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves is saved from becoming dinner for the headhunters by an unlikely, and unwanted, source.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 32 - Chew On This
item.description: Mr. Towers attempts to counteract the poison of the deadly bug that has bitten Jeeves.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: It's chew or die.
item.itunes:summary: Mr. Towers attempts to counteract the poison of the deadly bug that has bitten Jeeves.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 33 - The Antidote
item.description: Jeeves is cured of the deadly bug bite but suffers a nasty after-effect.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Antidote
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves is cured of the deadly bug bite but suffers a nasty after-effect.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 34 - Amnesia For One
item.description: Suffering from amnesia, Jeeves endures Towers' attempts to bring him out of it.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Get better, damn it!
item.itunes:summary: Suffering from amnesia, Jeeves endures Towers' attempts to bring him out of it.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 35 - One Lump Or Two
item.description: Jeeves is cured of his amnesia by Mr. Towers - the hard way.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The cure is worse than the disease.
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves is cured of his amnesia by Mr. Towers - the hard way.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 36 - Incoming
item.description: Now at the ocean, Jeeves and Towers make a startling discovery.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The beach.
item.itunes:summary: Now at the ocean, Jeeves and Towers make a startling discovery.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 37 - Perched on a Tuna
item.description: Washed out to sea by a tsunami, Jeeves and Towers find themselves high and dry upon the overturned hull of a battleship.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Perched on a Tuna.
item.itunes:summary: Washed out to sea by a tsunami, Jeeves and Towers find themselves high and dry upon the overturned hull of a battleship.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 38 - Towers Under Glass
item.description: Towers becomes delirious with hunger - and Jeeves is starting to look mighty tasty.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Towers under glass.
item.itunes:summary: Towers becomes delirious with hunger - and Jeeves is starting to look mighty tasty.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 39 - Beached
item.description: Jeeves awakes to find their battleship beached.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Beached
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves awakes to find their battleship beached.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 40 - A Pressing Matter
item.description: Towers attempts to get Towers safely down from the battleship, but Towers has a better way.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Going down?
item.itunes:summary: Towers attempts to get Towers safely down from the battleship, but Towers has a better way.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 41 - A Seafood Threat
item.description: Jeeves goes in search of Towers, but runs up against a formidable sea foe.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Seafood fights back.
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves goes in search of Towers, but runs up against a formidable sea foe.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 42 - The Nephew
item.description: Towers and Jeeves find Tower's nephew in a grass shack on the beach.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The nephew.
item.itunes:summary: Towers and Jeeves find Tower's nephew in a grass shack on the beach.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 43 - A Cell Of A Deal
item.description: Jeeves discovers that Towers had a cell phone during their entire adventure and reacts rather unpleasantly.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A Cell Of A Deal
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves discovers that Towers had a cell phone during their entire adventure and reacts rather unpleasantly.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 44 - The Pain The Pain
item.description: Back at Ivory Towers Estate, Jeeves finds the need to eliminate the nephew before he finds the errors in Tower's books.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Pain The Pain
item.itunes:summary: Back at Ivory Towers Estate, Jeeves finds the need to eliminate the nephew before he finds the errors in Tower's books.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 45 - Out You Go
item.description: Jeeves thinks he has found a way to get rid of the nephew
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Out You Go
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves thinks he has found a way to get rid of the nephew.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 46 - Suspicion
item.description: Fearing that Towers finally suspects him of embezzlement, Jeeves falls to pieces.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Suspicion
item.itunes:summary: Fearing that Towers finally suspects him of embezzlement, Jeeves falls to pieces.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 47 - The Will That Won't
item.description: Towers changes his will to include Jeeves, but his inclusion is anything but profitable.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Will That Won't
item.itunes:summary: Towers changes his will to include Jeeves, but his inclusion is anything but profitable.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 48 - The Changing Of The Will
item.description: Jeeves attempts to change Towers' will when his employer steps out of the room.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Changing Of The Will
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves attempts to change Towers' will when his employer steps out of the room.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 49 - One Final Plan
item.description: Jeeves tries to stop Towers from getting the will to the bank.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: One Final Plan
item.itunes:summary: Jeeves tries to stop Towers from getting the will to the bank.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Episode 50 - The Finale
item.description: Feeling guilty over the paultry amount left to Jeeves in his will, Mr. Towers revises it much to Jeeves' delight. Unfortunately, there is a nasty turn of events that threatens his happiness.
item.author: jls@jeffreylynnstoddard.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Finale
item.itunes:summary: Feeling guilty over the paultry amount left to Jeeves in his will, Mr. Towers revises it much to Jeeves' delight. Unfortunately, there is a nasty turn of events that threatens his happiness.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard
